participant_1.background:
My most valued material possession is my collection of children's books.
I got to go on a road trip with my siblings to celebrate my birthday.
I was forced to use my badge on a friend to get information out of them.
I am a fourth child who was once lucky enough to swim with manta rays.
I am a ballet-loving mom of four daughters.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy the Fourth of July because my favorite color is red, white, and blue.
i am funny.
i love comics.
my favorite thing to do is to go to museums.
i work 9 to 5 job.

content.text: Hi there, what are you up to today?
Hi, not much just working on my comics. What about you?
I am a ballet loving mom of four daughters, who is going to the museum this afternoon.
That's so cool, I love museums! I'm a 9 to 5 worker, so I don't get to go as much as I'd like.
What type of comics do you work on?
I mainly draw superhero comics, but I also enjoy working on other types of comics.
That's very cool, I love superhero comics! What's your favorite superhero?
My favorite superhero is Batman. I love his dark and mysterious personality.
Batman is a great superhero! I also love his dark and mysterious personality.
I'm glad you agree! What's your favorite thing about museums?
My favorite thing about museums is learning about new things and seeing all the different exhibits.
That's what I love about them too! I always learn something new when I go to a museum.
I'm glad we agree about museums! It's always nice to meet someone who shares your interests.
It is! I'm glad I met you too.
